info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:20PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles south of Alder, or 23 miles southwest of Virginia City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Jeffers and Cameron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
